item.title: Call for papers
item.description: Call for Papers The Digital Twin Ecosystems & Applications (DIGITA) workshop aims to provide a platform for sharing knowledge and experiences in the field of Digital Twin Ecosystems and their practical applications. This workshop seeks to explore the latest trends, challenges, and opportunities in the engineering and application of pervasive systems adopting the Digital Twin Ecosystems approach. Methodologies and tools for design and development, enabling technologies, and innovative use cases will be presented and discussed.
